results.content: Confusing from the get-go.  Bootstrap 4.1.2 is no longer available.  The instructor moves to fast and the first two lessons were very hard to follow.  I put many hours into this course, but just became to frustrated to keep going.  I would like a refund or at least a credit so I can buy another course.   Thanks you

results.content: Es lo peor, en el curso se vende como un sistema cms, y solo hace el front end y con errores, es increíble, pero me han estafado, como es posible que permitan eso, de verdad, he perdido mi dinero y mi tiempo. Incluso el título es CMS System..... es el colmo.
